title: Aidepsos? (polis)
description: The modern town of Aidepsos (formerly Lispo) in Greece, is usually identified as the original city and/or polis center of ancient Aidepsos. This location lies some three kilometers north of the extensive archaeologically attested spa center at modern Loutra Aidepsou.

properties.description: TIB representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 23
